name: Dawson Regular Fit Jeans
description:
Inspired by the leg shape used in the late 1950's early 1960's. These regular fit jeans include the following features :

-14.25 oz Japanese red selvage woven on man operated Toyoda looms
- Stone thread correct for the late 1950's denim makers
- Heavy Cotton twill pockets deadstock from WW2; British 1945.
- British Chrome leather patch, branded by hand
- Die cast heavy waistband button
- Two prong nail fly buttons this style was first patented around the 1870's.
- Copper branded washer and nail rivets
- Hidden back pocket rivets
- Poly/Cotton core spun threads from Germany developed espcially for denim
- Splayed back pockets
- All jeans are hemmed by our 1957 Union Special hemmer

Each order comes with a special bag made from french pillow case stripe cotton.

Wash care :

We recommend that you wash as least often as possible if you would like to maintain the colour of the Dry Denim. This fabric is pre-shrunk on our tests cold handwash we only saw a 1% shrinkage on it’s first wash so make sure you wash in cold water separately to reduce the shrinkage as much as possible, add a little salt in with the water to stabilize the indigo.

Log book :

Each of our products is sold with a log book which entitles the owner a free repair during the first 6 months. This does not affect your statutory rights.

All of our products are made by hand using vinatge sewing machines in Brighton, Great Britain.

© Dawson Denim 2012

name: Mercantile with Hinged Pocket.
description:
A variation on our existing long apron, this mercantile uses a traditional hinged pocket seen on aprons during the 1940's which  moves when you bend down, stopping anything inside falling out.

The pocket is trimmed with British leather for durability, this style also has a lower pocket with British Leather key loop.

We chain stitched the hem on our 1959 Union Special hemmer using a red thread. 

This apron is currently made to order.

The apron uses the whole width of the selvage and measures :

31” wide 
39” length

The apron is one of a numbered production run. Its details include copper grommets, Dawson branded die set buttons, heavy cotton webbing tape and copper rivets.

The Fabric :

13 oz Japanese Red Selvage; left dry.

Wash care :

We recommend that you wash as least often as possible if you would like to maintain the colour of the Dry Denim. This fabric is likely to shrink by 5% on it’s first wash so make sure you wash in cold water separately to reduce the shrinkage as much as possible, add a little salt in with the water to stabilize the indigo.

Log book :

Each of our aprons is sold with a log book which entitles the owner a free repair during the first 6 months. This does not affect your statutory rights.

© Dawson Denim 2012

name: Barista
description:
This apron is a variation on our Mechanic, designed specifically for Barista's. The neck tie is adjustable with the use of a D-ring fixed in place with a British leather trim. The lower pocket designed to fit a small order pad and pen.

The key feature is the option for you to have your own logo printed in vinyl at the top. See our blog for more photo's. 

The apron uses the whole width of the selvage and measures :

31” wide 
28” length

We welcome trade queries on this style, this style is made to order.

The Fabric :

13 oz Japanese Red Selvage; left dry.

Wash care :

We recommend that you wash as least often as possible if you would like to maintain the colour of the Dry Denim. This fabric is likely to shrink by 5% on it’s first wash so make sure you wash in cold water separately to reduce the shrinkage as much as possible, add a little salt in with the water to stabilize the indigo.

Log book :

Each of our aprons is sold with a log book which entitles the owner a free repair during the first 6 months if damaged. This does not affect your statutory rights.

© Dawson Denim 2012

name: Trader : Japanese selvage bellow pocket belt apron
description:
This apron is designed for those with a trade. Ideal for Waiters, Bar tenders and Barista's.

The apron measures :

16” wide 
9” length

The apron is one of a numbered production run. Its details include two large bellow pockets, small pen pocket, cotton webbing tape reinforced edges and copper rivets.

The Fabric :

13 oz Japanese Red Selvage; left dry.

Wash care :

We recommend that you wash as least often as possible if you would like to maintain the colour of the Dry Denim. This fabric is likely to shrink by 5% on it’s first wash so make sure you wash in cold water separately to reduce the shrinkage as much as possible, add a little salt in with the water to stabilize the indigo.

Log book :

Each of our aprons is sold with a log book which entitles the owner a free repair during the first 6 months if damaged. This does not affect your statutory rights.

name: The Helmet Bag : Selvage denim and Italian vegetable dyed leather
description:
We designed the Helmet Bag for our own use, it's inspired by the WW2 army issue bag. It comfortably fits a large size open face helmet, a 15" mac book pro or large enough for those over night essentials.

The bag is made from :

- 13.7 oz Japanese red line selvage denim
- 8oz/3.5mm Italian Vegetable tanned cowhide base and handles 
- handles are riveted with copped nail head rivets. 
- fully lined with a French Pillow Case stripe 
- fastened with a durable heavy brass zip; made in an Italian factory since 1923
- leather internal pocket 
- hand made leather embossed logo. 

Carry as a Holdall or it should fit over your shoulder.

All our goods are hand made in Brighton, Great Britain. 

The bag measures :

19" wide 
13" depth
6" width

We recommend not to wash this product.

For more detail visit our blog.

© Dawson Denim 2012

name: The Mechanic Apron, Red line Selvage workwear, inspired by WW2 army issue, made in Great Britain.
description:
The Mechanic is inspired by aprons worn and issued during WW2 for Mechanics. 

The apron uses the whole width of the selvage and measures : 

31” wide
28” length

The apron is one of a numbered production run. Its details include copper grommets, Dawson branded die set buttons, heavy cotton webbing tape and copper rivets.


The Fabric :

13 oz Japanese Red Selvage; left dry.

Wash care :

We recommend that you wash as least often as possible if you would like to maintain the colour of the Dry Denim. This fabric is likely to shrink by 5% on it’s first wash so make sure you wash in cold water separately to reduce the shrinkage as much as possible, add a little salt in with the water to stabilize the indigo.

Log book :

Each of our aprons is sold with a log book which entitles the owner a free repair during the first 6 months if damaged. This does not affect your statutory rights.

name: The Mercantile Apron, Selvage denim, inspired by 1950's shopkeepers workwear, Made in Great Britain.
description:
The Mercantile is inspired by the aprons worn by both men and women in Grocery and Dry Goods stores up until the 1950’s to protect clothing during the working day.

The apron uses the whole width of the selvage and measures :

31” wide
39” length

The apron is one of a numbered production run. Its details include copper grommets, Dawson branded die set buttons, heavy cotton webbing tape and copper rivets.

name: The Carpenter Belt Apron, Japanese Red Line Selvage, Made in Great Britain.
description:
The Carpenter; more of a belt. This style of apron is still used today by many Carpenters and includes a combination of pockets.

The Carpenter measures :

28” wide
13” depth

The apron is one of a numbered production run. Its details include copper grommets and heavy cotton webbing tape and copper rivets.

name: The Pinny, Japanese red line selvage, inspired by 1940's workwear apron, Made in Great Britain.
description:
The Pinny is inspired by aprons worn by workers in lumber yards across the USA up until the 1940’s, this apron is shorter and the neck and waist ties are fixed.

The apron uses the whole width of the selvage and measures :

22” wide
24” length

The apron is one of a numbered production run. Its details include copper grommets, Dawson branded die set buttons, heavy cotton webbing tape and copper rivets.


The Fabric :

13 oz Japanese Red Selvage; left dry.

We recommend that you wash as least often as possible if you would like to maintain the colour of the Dry Denim. name: 13 oz Japanese Selvage denim Utility Roll
description:
This Utility roll is inspired by the M10 British Army Tool Roll.

The tool roll measures a total of 6” x 10” 

This Utility roll is fully lined with a pre-washed French Vintage Stripe. It has a protective flap with a hidden pocket. There is a leather key fob and multiple pockets of various sizes. The Utility roll is held closed by a length of leather tipped Selvage and a rivet.

The Fabric :

13 oz Japanese Red Selvage; left dry, 100% cotton.

Wash care :

We recommend that you wash as least often as possible if you would like to maintain the colour of the Dry Denim. This fabric is likely to shrink by 5% on it’s first wash so make sure you wash in cold water separately to reduce the shrinkage as much as possible, add a little salt in with the water to stabilize the indigo.

name: The Helmet Bag, inspired by WW2 Army issue helmet bags used by the Air Corps 14 oz Bull Denim.
description:
We designed this bag for our own use. Silk screen printed by hand in Brighton. The Helmet bag will comfortably carry a large open-faced helmet. Lined fully with a hickory stripe, it has a hidden internal pocket and leather key ring loop.

18” wide
13” depth

The Fabric :

This is loomstate, 14oz bull denim.

Wash care :

We recommend that you wash as least often as possible, the fabric is unwashed and straight from the loom. Washing in cold water will result in minimal reduction in the colour of the print and shrinkage in the fabric.

name: Tote bag, Hand printed Bull Denim, Made in Great Britain.
description:
This is a large sized tote, silk screen printed by hand in Brighton. The bag is bound with 1950’s dead stock webbing and has a leather key ring loop and pocket.

18” wide
13” depth

The Fabric :

This is loomstate, 14oz bull denim.

Wash care :

We recommend that you wash as least often as possible, the fabric is unwashed and straight from the loom. Washing in cold water will result in minimal reduction in the colour of the print and shrinkage in the fabric.
